new_version: A new version of SCRCPY+ is ready to be downloaded
wcs_subtitle: Android 11+ is required for a wireless connection to be established.

scrcpy_flags.--turn-screen-off: Turn off the screen on the physical device
scrcpy_flags.--no-audio: Disable streaming audio from the device
scrcpy_flags.--otg: Simulate physical hardware connections for input devices
scrcpy_flags.--forward-all-clicks: Pass all mouse actions to the device
scrcpy_flags.--power-off-on-close: Turn off the screen when exiting the application
scrcpy_flags.--always-on-top: Make scrcpy always the foreground window
scrcpy_flags.--prefer-text: By default, letters are injected using key events, so that the keyboard behaves as expected in games (typically for WASD keys). But this may cause issues.
scrcpy_flags.--no-key-repeat: By default, holding a key down generates repeated key events. This can cause performance problems in some games, where these events are useless anyway.
scrcpy_flags.--lock-video-orientation: Prevent the device screen from rotating.
